short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vibrant neon streaks of light cutting through the darkness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the dynamic energy of a bustling city night with vibrant neon streaks of light cutting through the darkness. This theme brings a futuristic and high-speed vibe to your browser, Key features include the ability to see real-time weather information and your current location directly in the new tab. Perfect for those who appreciate motion, technology, and the allure of night drives.
